description: The cabling connecting the 19 properties will be removed following a legal dispute.
title: Sark Electricity to disconnect 19 homes from electricity grid
title_page: Sark Electricity to disconnect 19 homes from electricity grid - BBC News
maintext: John Robinson, one of the residents affected, said: "On Sark electricity is not just for heat and light, but all our water is pumped from boreholes. And it's needed for sanitation too, so it is probably the most crucial service."
